sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './DayNightCycle.css' export default function DayNightCycle() { function checkSunState() { if (this.props.is_day == 0) { if (!document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .classList.contains('nightTime')) { document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .style.animation = 'dayNightCycle 3s'; document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .style.animationFillMode = "forwards"; document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .classList.add('nightTime'); document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .classList.remove('dayTime'); } } else if (this.state.currentData.is_day == 1) { if (!document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .classList.contains('dayTime')) { document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .style.animation = 'dayNightCycle 3s'; document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .style.animationFillMode = "backwards"; document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .style.animationDirection = "reverse"; document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .classList.add('nightTime'); document.querySelector('.dayNightCircle') .classList.remove('dayTime'); } } } return(
) } /*
*/
